definitions.definition: A narrow, wooden or plastic platform mounted on pairs of wheels , on which one stands and propels oneself by pushing along the ground with one foot.
A vehicle chassis format, used for electric vehicles, which holds the drive motors and power energy store (ie. batteries), forming the vehicular base.

main_definition: ( sports , recreation ) A narrow, wooden or plastic platform mounted on pairs of wheels , on which one stands and propels oneself by pushing along the ground with one foot.
secondary_definitions: ( automotive ) A vehicle chassis format, used for electric vehicles, which holds the drive motors and power energy store (ie. batteries), forming the vehicular base.
